name: It's Quiz Time
description: Go head to head with a brand new massive quiz game on PC! Featuring our devious AI game host Salli, take on It’s Quiz Time’s catalogue of over 25,000 questions. Face off against up to 8 players using your smartphone, go solo, or use Live Show mode to stream and play along with your audiences!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 / 10 - 64-bit Processor: 2Ghz Intel CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 - 64-bit Processor: 2.60Ghz Intel Core i7 CPU Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: 4GB VRAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
